title: Mymuna
author: Mymuna
created_time: February 22, 2023, 07:14:34 AMLast edit: March 07, 2023, 04:30:15 PM by Mymuna
content: 1. Bounty campaign will be managed by Crypto Networks.2. 250 Million ScorpFin tokens are allocated for this Bounty.3. The bounty program was launched on 22.02.2023Disclaimer: By agreeing to participate in this bounty, you acknowledge that the wallet address and the email address you submitted are final and can't be changed, bounty manager reserves the right to make changes to the conditions at any time.Crypto Networks team can't assure the project's success as our duty is to provide a bounty management service for them as freelancers. We are responsible only for managing the campaign. We are not responsible for the project's success and continuity. Participating in this bounty campaign or investing in it will be at your own risk.1. All participants must join the ScorpFin's official Telegram  Group  2. All participants must join Crypto Networks Telegram Group.3. Talking about the bounty in the project chat group will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign and an instant ban from the company chat group.Please ask your bounty-related questions in the Crypto Networks 4. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.5. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behaviour will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.6. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed.7. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.Proof Of Registration Post Format:Code:Proof of Authentication PostBitcointalk Username:Bitcointalk Profile Link:Telegram Username:Campaign Category Participated:BEP-20 Wallet Address:BOUNTY ALLOCATION Twitter Campaign 50℅ Telegram 50%Week 1: 22 - 01Week 2: 02 -  08Week 3: 09 - 15Week 4: 16 - 21Submit your weekly report on bounty thread.1. Have more than 500 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 3000 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5000 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,000 followers: 5 stakes/weekRules:  1. Every participant must follow Twitter Page.  of 500 followers.3. Participants have to make 2 new tweets and 3 retweets per week (maximum 1 retweet and 1 Tweet per day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 12 hours minimum.5. Participants must use $scorpFin #scorpionfinance #ScorpFolio #ScorPay #ScorpNFTracker #ScorpGames #ScorpSwap #BSC #Crypto scorpion-finance.com https://t.me/ScorpFin hashtags in every retweet and tweet. And mention projects twitter @ScorpionFinance in every tweet.How to join:1. Join the ScorpFin's official Telegram Group: https://t.me/ScorpFin2. All participants must join Crypto Networks Telegram Group: https://t.me/Crypto_Networks_ManagementRewards:Per Week 5 Post5 StakesRules:  1. Update your Telegram name to "Your Name | scorpion-finance.com''. Only one project is allowed in your Telegram name.2. Replace your profile picture with ScorpFin's Logo : https://i.ibb.co/GRZSQSL/logo.jpg3. Write at least 5 constructive messages weekly in other crypto-related telegram groups with a minimum of 1k members.Posts/messages must be constructive, useful, and in a way that will not be considered as spamming.4. Deleted messages will not be counted.5. Report your telegram message links weekly.6. You must wear ScorpFin's avatar and text until the end of the campaign.7. Write at least 5 constructive messages weekly in other crypto-related telegram groups with a minimum of 1k members.Posts/messages must be constructive, useful, and in a way that will not be considered as spamming.8. Deleted messages will not be counted.9. Report your telegram message links weekly.10. You must wear ScorpFin's avatar and text until the end of the campaign.
